title: GitHub Actions 2026 Pricing Changes Evaluation
summary: GitHub Actions pricing changed Jan 1, 2026. GitHub-hosted runners get 40% discount + $0.002/min platform fee = net 25% savings. Self-hosted runners get $0.002/min fee starting March 31, 2026. Our system uses only GitHub-hosted runners so we benefit from the discount automatically.
key_facts: Enterprise and public repos exempt from changes
We have 30 workflows with 54 GitHub-hosted runner jobs
No action needed - pricing benefits us automatically
